Normally a quiet rural area, it is a host to various kidnappings and murders during the game's plot.","description":"<h2>Overview <\/h2>Inaba is a small town in rural Japan and the setting of the events of <a data-ref-id=\"3030-21373\" href=\"\/shin-megami-tensei-persona-4\/3030-21373\/\" slug=\"shin-megami-tensei-persona-4\">               Shin Megami Tensei:\u00a0 Persona 4<\/a>. Throughout the game, the player can run around Inaba and talk to residents, visit shops, work part-time jobs, and take on different side quests.\u00a0 Normally a quiet town, Inaba becomes the focus of media attention after a serial killer strikes and murders both the disgraced TV reporter <a data-ref-id=\"3005-9873\" href=\"\/mayumi-yamano\/3005-9873\/\" slug=\"mayumi-yamano\">              Mayumi Yamano<\/a> and <a data-ref-id=\"3005-8968\" href=\"\/saki-konishi\/3005-8968\/\" slug=\"saki-konishi\">             Saki Konishi<\/a>, the high school student that discovered Mayumi's body. <br\/>\u00a0<br\/><h2>Places of Note<\/h2>During the course of Persona 4, the player visits a variety of locations in and around Inaba.\u00a0 Some of the more notable landmarks include: <br\/><ul class=\"plain-list\"><li><a data-ref-id=\"3035-1784\" href=\"\/dojima-residence\/3035-1784\/\" slug=\"dojima-residence\">          The Dojima Residence<\/a>: The home of the player character's uncle <a data-ref-id=\"3005-8790\" href=\"\/ryotaro-dojima\/3005-8790\/\" slug=\"ryotaro-dojima\">         Ryotaro Dojima<\/a> and his daughter <a data-ref-id=\"3005-8791\" href=\"\/nanako-dojima\/3005-8791\/\" slug=\"nanako-dojima\">        Nanako<\/a>.\u00a0 The player stays with them for the duration of the school year.<\/li><li><a data-ref-id=\"3035-1285\" href=\"\/yasogami-high-school\/3035-1285\/\" slug=\"yasogami-high-school\">       Yasogami High School<\/a>: The high school that the player character and his friends attend.\u00a0 Unlike <a data-ref-id=\"3035-873\" href=\"\/gekkoukan-high-school\/3035-873\/\" slug=\"gekkoukan-high-school\">      Gekkoukan High School<\/a> in <a data-ref-id=\"3030-4473\" href=\"\/shin-megami-tensei-persona-3\/3030-4473\/\" slug=\"shin-megami-tensei-persona-3\">     Persona 3<\/a>, it is an older campus with fewer modern amenities.<\/li><li><a data-ref-id=\"3035-1787\" href=\"\/junes\/3035-1787\/\" slug=\"junes\">    Junes<\/a>: The Inaba branch of the Junes department store chain is home to the television that the characters use to visit the TV World.\u00a0 Yosuke's father is the store's manager.<\/li><li><a data-ref-id=\"3035-1786\" href=\"\/central-shopping-district\/3035-1786\/\" slug=\"central-shopping-district\">   Central Shopping District<\/a>: A district of small, independent shops and businesses owned and operated by local residents.\u00a0 The shop owners in the district feel threatened by Junes and fear the loss of their customers.<br\/><\/li><li><a data-ref-id=\"3035-2276\" href=\"\/amagi-inn\/3035-2276\/\" slug=\"amagi-inn\">  Amagi Inn<\/a>: A traditional Japanese inn owned and operated by the Amagi family.\u00a0 Yukiko is the next in the Amagi line to inherit the duty of managing it.<\/li><li><a data-ref-id=\"3035-1785\" href=\"\/samegawa-flood-plain\/3035-1785\/\" slug=\"samegawa-flood-plain\"> Samegawa Flood Plain<\/a>: A plain that runs along the Samegawa River, it functions as a park where people go to relax and try their hands at fishing.<br\/><\/li><\/ul>\u00a0<br\/><h2>Persona 3 Portable <\/h2>In <a data-ref-id=\"3030-27861\" href=\"\/shin-megami-tensei-persona-3-portable\/3030-27861\/\" slug=\"shin-megami-tensei-persona-3-portable\">            Persona 3 Portable<\/a>, the characters travel to Inaba to participate in the sports festival.\u00a0 While there, the characters stay at the Amagi Inn and visit Yasogami High School.<br\/><br\/><h2>Inaba Facts:<\/h2><ul class=\"plain-list\"><li>Inaba's town specialty is beef even though the town has no cows. This is pointed out by several pedestrians.<\/li><\/ul>","first_appeared_in_game":{"api_detail_url":"http:\/\/www.giantbomb.com\/api\/game\/3030-21373\/","id":21373,"name":"Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 4"},"id":1837,"image":{"icon_url":"http:\/\/www.giantbomb.com\/api\/image\/square_avatar\/827947-p4map.jpg","medium_url":"http:\/\/www.giantbomb.com\/api\/image\/scale_medium\/827947-p4map.jpg","screen_url":"http:\/\/www.giantbomb.com\/api\/image\/screen_medium\/827947-p4map.jpg","small_url":"http:\/\/www.giantbomb.com\/api\/image\/scale_small\/827947-p4map.jpg","super_url":"http:\/\/www.giantbomb.com\/api\/image\/scale_large\/827947-p4map.jpg","thumb_url":"http:\/\/www.giantbomb.com\/api\/image\/scale_avatar\/827947-p4map.jpg","tiny_url":"http:\/\/www.giantbomb.com\/api\/image\/square_mini\/827947-p4map.jpg"},"name":"Inaba","site_detail_url":"http:\/\/www.giantbomb.com\/inaba\/3035-1837\/"},"version":"1.0"}
